summary.span: 包装 ActiveX 控件，并将它们作为功能完整的 Windows 窗体控件公开。

span.span: Wraps ActiveX controls and exposes them as fully featured Windows Forms controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常不使用直接类。You typically do not use the class directly. 可以使用[Aximp.exe （Windows 窗体 ActiveX 控件导入程序）](~/docs/framework/tools/aximp-exe-windows-forms-activex-control-importer.md)生成扩展包装。You can use the [Aximp.exe (Windows Forms ActiveX Control Importer)](~/docs/framework/tools/aximp-exe-windows-forms-activex-control-importer.md) to generate the wrappers that extend . ActiveX 控件导入程序将生成一个类派生自类，并将它编译为可以作为对你的应用程序的引用添加的库文件 (DLL)。The ActiveX Control Importer generates a class that is derived from the class, and compiles it into a library file (DLL) that can be added as a reference to your application. 或者，可以使用`/source`开关和 ActiveX 控件导入程序，为生成一个 C# 文件，你派生的类。Alternatively, you can use the `/source` switch with the ActiveX Control Importer and a C# file is generated for your derived class. 然后可以对代码进行更改并重新编译为一个库文件。You can then make changes to the code and recompile it into a library file. > [!NOTE] > 如果 ActiveX 控件的成员的名称与.NET Framework 中定义的名称，则 ActiveX 控件导入程序将成员名称加上前缀"Ctl"时它会创建派生的类。If the name of a member of the ActiveX control matches a name defined in the .NET Framework, then the ActiveX Control Importer will prefix the member name with "Ctl" when it creates the derived class. 例如，如果 ActiveX 控件有一个名为"布局"成员，就会重命名"CtlLayout"中的派生类，因为`Layout`事件在.NET Framework 中定义。For example, if your ActiveX control has a member named "Layout", it is renamed "CtlLayout" in the derived class because the `Layout` event is defined within the .NET Framework. 大多数的常见属性的类才有效，如果基础 ActiveX 控件公开这些属性使用。Most of the common properties of the class are only valid and used if the underlying ActiveX control exposes those properties. 下面是一些常用属性的示例， ， ，和。A few examples of the common properties are , , , and . > [!NOTE] > 如果使用的 Visual Studio 作为您的 Windows 窗体设计环境，你可以提供 ActiveX 控件到你的应用程序通过将 ActiveX 控件添加到您的工具箱。If you are using Visual Studio as your Windows Forms design environment, you can make an ActiveX control available to your application by adding the ActiveX control to your Toolbox. 若要完成此操作，右键单击**工具箱**，选择**自定义工具箱**，然后浏览到 ActiveX 控件的.ocx 文件。To accomplish this, right-click the **Toolbox**, select **Customize Toolbox**, then browse to the ActiveX control's.ocx file. 有关详细信息，请参阅 Visual Studio 文档中的"添加 ActiveX 控件向 Windows 窗体"。For more information, see "Adding ActiveX Controls to Windows Forms" in the Visual Studio documentation. ## Examples 下面的代码示例重写构造函数中，并并方法的派生的类包装 Microsoft 屏蔽编辑 ActiveX 控件。The following code example overrides the constructor, and the and methods of an derived class that wraps the Microsoft Masked Edit ActiveX Control. 此代码需要通过运行 AxImp.exe MSMask32.ocx 文件上创建了生成的源代码`/source`开关来生成包装器类，以便对其进行编辑。This code requires that you have created the generated source code by running the AxImp.exe on the MSMask32.ocx file with the `/source` switch to generate the wrapper class to be edited. 此代码仅显示 C# 语法因为这是唯一的语言输出由 AxImp.exe。This code is only shown in C# syntax because that is the only language output by the AxImp.exe. [!code-csharp[AxHost_Wrap_MaskEdit#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/AxHost_Wrap_MaskEdit/CS/axmsmask.cs#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果的二进制表示形式`flags`参数值包含表示值 0x1 的位，将不包含该控件的快捷菜单**编辑**选项，除非该 ActiveX 控件显式提供了它。If the binary representation of the `flags` parameter value contains the bit represented by the value 0x1, the shortcut menu for the control will not contain an **Edit** option unless the ActiveX control explicitly provides it. 如果的二进制表示形式`flags`参数值包含表示值 0x2 的位，该控件的快捷菜单将包含属性选项，如果 ActiveX 控件提供了一组属性页; 否则为快捷菜单将包含属性选项，仅当 ActiveX 控件显式提供。If the binary representation of the `flags` parameter value contains the bit represented by the value 0x2, the shortcut menu for the control will contain a Properties option if the ActiveX control offers a set of property pages; otherwise, the shortcut menu will contain a Properties option only if the ActiveX control explicitly provides it.

span.span: A double-precision floating-point number that contains an OLE Automation date equivalent to specified value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 其值是从午夜，1899 年 12 月 30 天的数的浮点数形式实现的 OLE 自动化日期。An OLE Automation date is implemented as a floating-point number whose value is the number of days from midnight, 30 December 1899. 例如，午夜 1899 年 12 月 31 日由表示 1.0;上午 6 时，由 2.25; 表示 1900 年 1 月 1午夜 1899 年 12 月 29 为由-1.0;和上午 6 到 1899 年 12 月 29-1.25 由表示。For example, midnight, 31 December 1899 is represented by 1.0; 6 A.M., 1 January 1900 is represented by 2.25; midnight, 29 December 1899 is represented by -1.0; and 6 A.M., 29 December 1899 is represented by -1.25. 基础 OLE 自动化日期是 1899 年 12 月 30 日午夜。The base OLE Automation Date is midnight, 30 December 1899. 最大的 OLE 自动化日期等同于、 31 年 12 月的那一刻 9999。The maximum OLE Automation Date is the same as , the last moment of 31 December 9999. 有关 OLE 自动化的详细信息，请参阅[MSDN 库](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37118)。For more information about OLE Automation, see the [MSDN Library](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37118).

exception.span: 此实例的值无法表示为 OLE 自动化日期。

span.span: The value of this instance cannot be represented as an OLE Automation Date.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familystatic hidebysig valuetype System.DateTime GetTimeFromOADate(float64 date) cil managed
Protected Shared Function GetTimeFromOADate (date As Double) As DateTime

param.name: date
param.span: 要转换的 OLE 自动化日期。

span.span: The OLE Automate date to translate.

summary.span: 返回与指定的 OLE 自动化日期对应的 结构。

span.span: Returns a structure that corresponds to the specified OLE Automation date.

returns.span: 表示与 相同的日期和时间的 。

span.span: A that represents the same date and time as .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `date`参数是的双精度浮点数，它将日期表示的基日期，1899 年 12 月 30 日午夜之前或之后的天数。The `date` parameter is a double-precision floating-point number that represents a date as the number of days before or after the base date, midnight, 30 December 1899. 符号和整数部分`date`编码日期为正或负天的偏移量从 30 1899 年 12 月和值的小数部分的绝对值`date`将编码为天从午夜的偏移量的一小部分的时间。The sign and integral part of `date` encode the date as a positive or negative day displacement from 30 December 1899, and the absolute value of the fractional part of `date` encodes the time of day as a fraction of a day displacement from midnight. `date` 必须是介于负 657435.0 到正 2958466.0 之间的值。`date` must be a value between negative 657435.0 through positive 2958466.0. 请注意，由于日期进行编码的方式，有两种方法来表示任何时间的 30 1899 年 12 月。Note that because of the way dates are encoded, there are two ways of representing any time of day on 30 December 1899. 例如，-0.5，0.5 意味着中午 1899 年 12 月 30 天的偏移量加或减基零天仍然是基本的日期，因此从午夜的半天位移是中午。For example, -0.5 and 0.5 both mean noon on 30 December 1899 because a day displacement of plus or minus zero days from the base date is still the base date, and a half day displacement from midnight is noon. 有关 OLE 自动化的详细信息，请参阅[MSDN 库](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37118)。For more information about OLE Automation, see the [MSDN Library](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37118).

exception.span: 日期不是有效的 OLE 自动化日期值。

span.span: The date is not a valid OLE Automation Date value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 窗口消息预处理，以确定给定的输入的字符是否应经过预处理，或直接发送到 ActiveX 控件过程中调用方法。The method is called during window message preprocessing to determine whether the given input character should be preprocessed or sent directly to the ActiveX control. 字符的预处理包括检查的字符是否另一个控件的助记键。The preprocessing of a character includes checking whether the character is a mnemonic of another control. 在中实现类，方法始终返回`true`，因此指定的字符将直接发送到 ActiveX 控件。As implemented in the class, the method always returns `true`, so the specified character is sent directly to the ActiveX control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法还允许派生的类来处理不附加委托的方法。The method also allows derived classes to handle the method without attaching a delegate. 这是处理的首选的技术派生类中的方法。This is the preferred technique for handling the method in a derived class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例重写构造函数中，并并方法的派生的类包装 Microsoft 屏蔽编辑 ActiveX 控件。The following code example overrides the constructor, and the and methods of an derived class that wraps the Microsoft Masked Edit ActiveX Control. 此代码需要通过运行 AxImp.exe MSMask32.ocx 文件上创建了生成的源代码`/source`开关来生成包装器类，以便对其进行编辑。This code requires that you have created the generated source code by running the AxImp.exe on the MSMask32.ocx file with the `/source` switch to generate the wrapper class to be edited. 此代码仅显示 C# 语法因为这是唯一的语言输出由 AxImp.exe。This code is only shown in C# syntax because that is the only language output by the AxImp.exe. [!code-csharp[AxHost_Wrap_MaskEdit#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/AxHost_Wrap_MaskEdit/CS/axmsmask.cs#1)]

para.span: 重写时在派生类中，请务必调用基类的方法，以便已注册的委托接收方法。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the method.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void ShowPropertyPages() cil managed

summary.span: 显示与 ActiveX 控件关联的属性页。

span.span: Displays the property pages associated with the ActiveX control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果是`false`，未显示任何属性页。If is `false`, no property pages are displayed. 属性页允许 ActiveX 控件用户可以查看和更改 ActiveX 控件属性。Property pages allow an ActiveX control user to view and change ActiveX control properties. 通过调用控件的属性对话框中，其中包含一个或多个属性页提供用于查看和编辑控件属性的自定义的图形界面访问这些属性。These properties are accessed by invoking a control properties dialog box, which contains one or more property pages that provide a customized, graphical interface for viewing and editing the control properties.
